name: Soul Reaper (itch) (Cyklon_3000)
description:
Soul ReaperGameplay

In "Soul Reaper" you are playing as a reaper hunting down ghosts on a spooky graveyard.  Ghosts drop their soul when dying, those souls are absorbed by the reaper and can be used to upgrade the reaper. 

By dealing damage your score increases. Compete with players all around the World for a spot on the Leaderboard.

Guide Controls Move'W', 'A', 'S' & 'D'Attack'Space' & 'left Mouse Button'
Trade'Q' Gameplay

Move around and search for ghosts to kill. (Backup so they cant hit you) After a ghost dropped his soul, the soul will float towards you until the reaper absorbed it. 

When approaching special tombstones you can trade your souls for powerups. There are 3 different powerups to trade:

PowerupCostEffectMax. trades per tombstoneTombstones of this typeHealth5 Souls+2 Health Points (not max Health!)infinite4Strength9 Souls+1 Attack Damage13Speed4 Souls+1 Movement Speed25

Over time the game gets increasingly harder, make sure to spend your souls wisely.
